import React, { useEffect} from "react"; import {getIdVideogames} from '../actions/index'; import { Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import style from "./Detail.module.css" export default function DetailVideogame(props){ const dispatch=useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getIdVideogames(props.match.params.id)); },[dispatch]) const myVideogame=useSelector((state)=>state.detail) return (
{ myVideogame.length>0 ?

{myVideogame[0].name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + myVideogame[0].name.slice(1)}

{myVideogame[0].description}

{myVideogame[0].genres.map(elem=>elem.name).join(" ")}

elem.name).join(" ")}/>

{myPokemon[0].Types.map(elem=>elem.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + elem.name.slice(1)).join(" ")}

) }
